General.Name: Exotic Food Public Company Limited
General.Description: Exotic Food Public Company Limited manufactures, trades in, and exports various food products worldwide. The company's products include dipping and cooking marinate sauces, salad dressing and oils, wok sauce, cooking pastes, cooking essentials, herbs and spices, fruits and vegetables, heat and serve, noodles, stir-fry sauces and curry sauce, snacks, and Japanese range of products, as well as seasonings and canned products. It offers its products under the Exotic Food, Thai Pride, and Coco-Loto brands. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
